title: Wait, so whats the deal with Warwick?
body:
Everyone says hes really OP and stuff, how?

Does he synergies with the new jungle really well or something? Was he buffed?

Answer plz.

replies.body: I just use ignite first on high regen champs like warwick and burn him down quickly. He isnt really much of an issue after that.

Skirmisher, BotKR, and his ultimate and he's impossible to itemize against.

Throw in a Wit's End for lolz

Warwick has always been broken, he just wasn't popular. This new item has pushed him from OP to broken, and highly popular, he has an amazing kit and even if you QSS his ult you're still going to get %%%%ed up by his insane damage and sustain.

He farms insanely well in the new jungle and with the new jungle items he does a metric %%%% ton of magic damage and a bunch of true damage as well with his ult making well co-ordinated ganks a Garen-teed kill with little counterplay.

I expect him to get hit with the nerf hammer very soon.

His sustain in the jungle currently makes him an easy pick I think.
I think as people get used to the new jungle that will slowly change.
